import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { userAPI } from '../services/api'; import { UserDocuments } from '../types'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Loading from '../components/Loading'; const Documents: React.FC = () => { const [documents, setDocuments] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const fetchDocuments = async () => { try { const response = await userAPI.getUserDocuments(); if (response.success) { setDocuments(response.data || null); } else { setError(response.message || 'Failed to load documents'); } } catch (err) { setError('Network error. Please try again.'); console.error('Documents error:', err); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchDocuments(); }, []); if (loading) return ; const documentTypes = [ { id: 'aadhaar', title: 'Aadhaar Card', description: 'Unique Identity Document', status: documents?.aadhaar ? 'available' : 'missing', route: '/documents/aadhaar', bgColor: 'bg-orange-50', borderColor: 'border-orange-200', textColor: 'text-orange-700', accentColor: 'bg-orange-500' }, { id: 'pan', title: 'PAN Card', description: 'Permanent Account Number', status: documents?.pan ? 'available' : 'missing', route: '/documents/pan', bgColor: 'bg-blue-50', borderColor: 'border-blue-200', textColor: 'text-blue-700', accentColor: 'bg-blue-500' }, { id: 'driving-license', title: 'Driving License', description: 'Motor Vehicle Authorization', status: documents?.drivingLicense ? 'available' : 'missing', route: '/documents/driving-license', bgColor: 'bg-green-50', borderColor: 'border-green-200', textColor: 'text-green-700', accentColor: 'bg-green-500' }, { id: 'passport', title: 'Passport', description: 'International Travel Document', status: documents?.passport ? 'available' : 'missing', route: '/documents/passport', bgColor: 'bg-indigo-50', borderColor: 'border-indigo-200', textColor: 'text-indigo-700', accentColor: 'bg-indigo-500' } ]; const availableDocuments = documentTypes.filter(doc => doc.status === 'available'); const missingDocuments = documentTypes.filter(doc => doc.status === 'missing'); return (
{/* Header */}

)} {/* Statistics */}

{doc.title}

{doc.description}

{doc.status === 'available' ? 'Available' : 'Not Available'}

Document Not Available
)}
))}
{/* Help Section */}

Need Help?

If you're missing any documents, you can apply for them through the respective government portals.

Aadhaar: uidai.gov.in PAN: incometax.gov.in Passport: passportindia.gov.in
); }; export default Documents;
